TopicTitle: Hey folks, what are your favorite worlds in KSP2?

Articles.Content: For me, it's Tylo. The views are awesome, the music is great, and it is an actually challenging place! I can definitely tell that my shipyard for interstellar spacecraft will be in Tylo orbit
I haven't seen them all yet but I think it may still be Moho.

Have you heard eeloos music yet? I have, it literally sounds like you are going interstellar and are stopping at eeloo to refuel. So far its my favourite, although I haven’t heard mohos yet, is it good?
Bro they are all SO good! I guess the only few places not as good as the average are Eve, and the tiny Bop, pol, and gilly moons. Everything else is out of this world
